featured.title: Major
featured.description: Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan faces his biggest battle when he joins the task force to save the occupants at the Taj Hotel attacked by a terrorist group.

featured.title: Hi Nanna
featured.description: A doting father and his 6-year-old daughter find their lives taking a dramatic turn when the woman he loves marries someone else.

featured.title: La La Land
featured.description: When Sebastian, a pianist, and Mia, an actress, follow their passion and achieve success in their respective fields, they find themselves torn between their love for each other and their careers.

featured.title: Happydays
featured.description: A group of eight youngsters from an engineering college form an unbreakable friendship after going through various struggles.

crime.title: HIT: The Second Case
crime.description: Krishna Dev, a nonchalant police officer, investigates a gruesome murder case and as the case unfolds, the level of danger rises.

crime.title: Lucky Bhasker
crime.description: A cash-strapped cashier working at a bank embarks on a risky investment scheme and soon gets drawn into the murky world of money laundering.

crime.title: Yashodha
crime.description: An innocent woman agrees to be a surrogate mother at a highly plush facility to find her missing sister. However, she uncovers the shocking truth about the centre.

crime.title: Pushpa 2
crime.description: A powerful smuggler goes head-to-head with a vengeful enemy while controlling politics and managing high-stakes confrontations. A public apology sparks a tense showdown, culminating in a challenge.

continue.title: Ocean's Eleven
continue.description: Danny Ocean, a gangster, rounds up a gang of associates to stage a sophisticated and elaborate casino heist which involves robbing three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously during a popular boxing event.

continue.title: ZNMD
continue.description: Friends Kabir, Imran and Arjun take a vacation in Spain before Kabir's marriage. The trip turns into an opportunity to mend fences, heal wounds, fall in love with life and combat their worst fears.

continue.title: Kushi
continue.description: A young man from an agnostic family falls in love with the daughter of his father's arch-rival, a devout Hindu leader.

continue.title: Jumanji Next Level
continue.description: When Spencer goes missing, his group of friends return to Jumanji to travel unexplored territories and help him escape the world's most dangerous game.
